channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Popup4Phone
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Popup4Phone

item.title: CVE-2024-3231|2024-08-01T20:05:08.235Z -- unknown -- popup4phone
item.description: The Popup4Phone WordPress plugin through 1.3.2 does not sanitise and escape some parameters, which could allow unauthenticated users to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks against admins.

item.title: CVE-2024-3580|2024-08-01T20:12:07.739Z -- unknown -- popup4phone
item.description: The Popup4Phone WordPress plugin through 1.3.2 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as Editor to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)

item.title: CVE-2024-3231|2024-06-04T17:31:14.157Z -- unknown -- popup4phone
item.description: The Popup4Phone WordPress plugin through 1.3.2 does not sanitise and escape some parameters, which could allow unauthenticated users to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks against admins.

item.title: CVE-2024-3580|2024-06-04T17:31:58.413Z -- unknown -- popup4phone
item.description: The Popup4Phone WordPress plugin through 1.3.2 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as Editor to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
